devdoc.details: Implements the simple market place.  Seller can open a sell order, then buyers can directly buy it.

cancelTrade(uint256).details: Cancels a trade by the poster.

params.tradeId: The id for the trade to be cancelled.
The id of an existing trade

getTrade(uint256).details: Returns the details for a trade.

openTrade(uint256,uint256).details: Opens a new trade. Puts item in escrow.

params.itemId: The id for the item to trade.
params.price: The amount of currency for which to trade the item.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.itemTokenAddress: The address of the ERC721 contract.

totalTrade().details: Returns the total count of all trades.

totalTradeOf(address).details: Returns the trade count for the nft owner.

params.poster: The address of the nft owner.

tradeOfPosterByIndex(address,uint256).details: Returns the trade id with then specified index number of the poster.

params.poster: The address of the nft owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
